瓛字的基本解释

瓛
huán
古代的一种玉，长九寸。

瓛
yè
马嚼子。

瓛
yà
器物名。亦称“玉甑”。

瓛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》胡官切，平桓，匣。］
圭名。桓圭，古代公爵所执的玉圭。
[②]［yè］
［《篇海類編》延結切］
马鑣。即勒在马口里的小铁链。
[③]［yǎn］
［《篇海類編》魚蹇切］
器名，即玉甑。

瓛字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瓛； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页745第30
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡官切，音桓。【說文】桓圭，公所執。从玉獻，會意。【集韻】通作桓。　又人名。【劉峻·辨命論】近世有沛國劉瓛，瓛弟璡，?一時之秀士也。　又【正韻】字書又音钀，馬鑣也。　又【集韻】許建切，音獻。桓圭也。

瓛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓛字的起名意思

古代的一种玉，长九寸；玉圭的一种，多用于人名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huán]
["Guangyun" Hu Guanqie, Pinghuan, Xie. ]
Guyana. Huan Kyu, Yu Kyu held by the ancient duke.
[②]［yè］
["Pianhai Leibian" extension and cutting]
Horse wing. That is, the small iron chain in the horse's mouth.
[③]［yǎn］
["Pianhai Leibian" Fish Snipe Cut]
The name of the device is Yuzeng.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Wu Ji 1】【Jade Character Department】　瓛; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 745 to 30
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Guan cut, Yin Huan. [Said the text] Huangui, the office of the office. From Yuxian, know it. 【Ji Yun】Tong Zuohuan.　Another name. [Liu Jun·Fate Theory] In modern times, there is Liu Wei from Peiguo, and the younger brother Wei, who is also a talented person of the time.　[Zhengyun] The word book has a sound, and the horse is also.　[Ji Yun] Xu Jianqie, Yin Xian. Huan Kyu also.
